languages.text: "Некий немочь, назвавшийся Хэ, вышел к нашим людям из чащи. Понимать его сложно, но он смог донести до солдат, что "Халкион и Кессей бьются. Халкион — обычно, Кессей — неправильно скверно". Кажется, он хочет сотрудничать и пытается призвать нас на помощь".

"Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."
languages.original_text: "Некий немочь, назвавшийся Хэ, вышел к нашим людям из чащи. Понимать его сложно, но он смог донести до солдат, что "Халкион и Кессей бьются. Халкион — обычно, Кессей — неправильно скверно". Кажется, он хочет сотрудничать и пытается призвать нас на помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Some sickly creature by the name of Xae have come out of the thicket to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he had managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halkyon and Kessey are fighting. Halkyon in its usual way and Kessey in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and are trying to ask us for help."

It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and are trying to ask us for help."

languages.text: “有个叫做卡戈的丑恶种走出了荒野，找到了我们的人。他的话语很难理解，但他设法向士兵们解释道。‘哈西恩和凯塞正在战斗。哈西恩代表正道，而凯塞代表着错误与堕落。’他似乎想和我们达成合作，请求我们伸出援手。”
languages.original_text: "Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."

traits.locale_text: “有个叫做卡戈的丑恶种走出了荒野，找到了我们的人。他的话语很难理解，但他设法向士兵们解释道。‘哈西恩和凯塞正在战斗。哈西恩代表正道，而凯塞代表着错误与堕落。’他似乎想和我们达成合作，请求我们伸出援手。”
“有个叫做‘泽’的丑恶种走出了丛林，找到了我们的人。他的话语很难理解，但他设法向士兵们解释道。‘哈西恩和凯塞正在战斗。哈西恩代表正道，而凯塞代表着错误与堕落。’他似乎想和我们达成合作，请求我们伸出援手。”

languages.text: «Una abominación llamada Khegh ha salido de la espesura para reunirse con nuestra gente. Es difícil entenderle, pero ha conseguido explicar a los soldados que "Halchyon y Kessei están luchando. Halchyon de forma habitual y Kessei de forma corrupta y malvada". Parece que quiere colaborar con nosotros e intenta pedirnos ayuda».
languages.original_text: "Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."

traits.locale_text: «Una abominación llamada Khegh ha salido de la espesura para reunirse con nuestra gente. Es difícil entenderle, pero ha conseguido explicar a los soldados que "Halchyon y Kessei están luchando. Halchyon de forma habitual y Kessei de forma corrupta y malvada". Parece que quiere colaborar con nosotros e intenta pedirnos ayuda».

languages.text: 「クヘグフという名の異民が、我が兵に会おうと雑木林から出てきたのだ。彼の言葉を理解するのは難しいが、彼は兵士たちに'ハルシオンとケッセイが戦っている。ハルシオンはいつものやり方で、ケッセイは間違った堕落したやり方だ'といったことを何とか説明することができた。彼は私たちに協力の意を見せ、助けを求めているみたいだ」
languages.original_text: "Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."

traits.locale_text: 「ザエという名の異民が、我が兵に会おうと雑木林から出てきたのだ。彼の言葉を理解するのは難しいが、彼は兵士たちに'ハルシオンとケッセイが戦っている。ハルシオンはいつものやり方で、ケッセイは間違った堕落したやり方だ'といったことを何とか説明することができた。彼は私たちに協力の意を見せ、助けを求めているみたいだ」
「ザエという名の異民が、我が兵に会おうと雑木林から出てきたのだ。彼の言葉を理解するのは難しいが、彼は兵士たちに'ハルシオンとケッセイが戦っている。ハルシオンはいつものやり方で、ケッセイは間違った堕落したやり方だ'といったことを何とか説明することができた。彼は私たちに協力の意を見せ、助けを求めているみたいだ」

languages.text: « Un infâme du nom de Khegh a émergé de la nature sauvage pour venir à la rencontre de nos gens. Bien qu'il s'exprime de manière difficilement compréhensible, il est parvenu à leur faire comprendre ceci : "Halchyon et Kessei se font la guerre. Halchyon se comporte comme à son habitude, et Kessei agit de manière anormale, corrompue." Il implore notre aide et semble prêt à collaborer. »
languages.original_text: "Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."

traits.locale_text: « Un infâme du nom de Khegh a émergé de la nature sauvage pour venir à la rencontre de nos gens. Bien qu'il s'exprime de manière difficilement compréhensible, il est parvenu à leur faire comprendre ceci : "Halchyon et Kessei se font la guerre. Halchyon se comporte comme à son habitude, et Kessei agit de manière anormale, corrompue." Il implore notre aide et semble prêt à collaborer. »

languages.text: "Ein Speier namens Khegh kam aus der Wildnis, um unsere Leute zu begrüßen. Man versteht ihn kaum, aber es ist ihm gelungen, den Soldaten zu erklären, dass, Zitat: 'Halchyon und Kessei kämpfen. Halchyon auf seine übliche Weise, Kessei auf falsche, verderbte Weise.' Offenbar will er mit uns zusammenarbeiten und versucht, um Hilfe zu bitten."
languages.original_text: "Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Speier namens Khegh kam aus der Wildnis, um unsere Leute zu begrüßen. Man versteht ihn kaum, aber es ist ihm gelungen, den Soldaten zu erklären, dass, Zitat: 'Halchyon und Kessei kämpfen. Halchyon auf seine übliche Weise, Kessei auf falsche, verderbte Weise.' Offenbar will er mit uns zusammenarbeiten und versucht, um Hilfe zu bitten."

"Ein Speier namens Xae ist aus dem Unterholz gekommen, um unsere Leute zu begrüßen. Man versteht ihn kaum, aber es ist ihm gelungen, den Soldaten zu erklären, dass, Zitat: 'Halchyon und Kessei kämpfen, Halchyon auf seine übliche Weise, Kessei auf falsche, verderbte Weise.' Offenbar will er mit uns kollaborieren und versucht, um Hilfe zu bitten."

languages.text: "Khegh adındaki bir leş, halkımızla tanışmak için yabandan çıkıp geldi. Kendisini anlamak zor olsa da askerlere 'Halchyon ile Kessei dövüşüyorlar. Halchyon, her zamanki gibi dövüşüyor. Kessei ise yanlış, yozlaşmış bir şekilde dövüşüyor.' şeklinde bir açıklama yapmayı başardı. Görünüşe göre bizimle iş birliği yapmak niyetinde ve yardımımızı istemeye çalışıyor."
languages.original_text: "Some retch by the name of Khegh has come out of the wilderness to meet our people. It is hard to understand him, but he has managed to explain to the soldiers that 'Halchyon and Kessei are fighting. Halchyon in the usual way and Kessei in a wrong, corrupted way.' It seems that he wants to collaborate with us and is trying to ask for help."
